text: Neagu Djuvara (; August 18, 1916 – January 25, 2018) was a Romanian historian, essayist, philosopher, journalist, novelist and diplomat. He was born in Bucharest. Djuvara was an active contributor to Radio Free Europe. Jean-Pierre Longre, "Les tribulations d’un Roumain dans le monde" ("The Tribulations of a Romanian throughout the World") , at Sitartmag, retrieved June 13, 2007 Between 1991 and 1998, he was an Associate Professor at the University of Bucharest. During the early 1990s, he was a noted critic of Romanian political developments.
